metadata.description: Max. The warrior Max. Haunted by his past and fated to wander the brutal Wasteland in search of his better self. To do so, Max Rockatansky enters Gastown, the only source of guzzoline for thousands of miles. Here he finds the final piece that he needs to rebuild his Interceptor-the powerful Boss 351 engine. But in order to acquire the fabled V8 in a world where car parts are worth more than a man's life, Max must survive a gladiatorial battle in a place called...Thunderdome Plus!
metadata.name: Mad Max: Fury Road
